scripts.package:change: pnpm changeset && git stage ./.changeset/* && git commit --m "feat: changeset" && git push
scripts.package:canary: pnpm changeset version --snapshot canary && git add -A; git commit --m "canary: changeset" && git push && changeset publish --tag canary && changeset tag && git tag --delete relay-sdk-demo@undefined && git push --follow-tags
scripts.package:release: pnpm run deploy && changeset version && pnpm --filter=!demo -r publish --access public && changeset tag && git tag --delete relay-sdk-demo@undefined && git push --follow-tags
scripts.build: pnpm run build:sdk && pnpm run build:hooks && pnpm run build:ui && pnpm run build:adapter
